create_field.generic_error: An error occurred while creating the field
create_field.is_enum.subtitle: It takes a limited number of distinct values, like a status code
create_field.is_enum.title: This field is an enumerated value
create_field.name_conflict_error: A field with this name already exists
create_field.name_min_error: The name must be at least 1 character long
create_field.name_regex_error: Only lower case alphanumeric and _, must start with a letter
create_field.option_required_warning: Be careful when adding a required field on an active table. If you are already ingesting data or creating decisions via API, they will fail when you add a required field. We recommend you first create the field as optional, add it to your ingestion pipeline, and then mark it as required.
create_field.title: Create a new field
create_link.must_point_to_unique_field: A link must point to a unique field in the target table. If you want to point to another field of the table, please mark it as unique first.
create_link.title: Create a new link
create_navigation_option.errors.duplicat: A navigation option already exists with these parameters
create_navigation_option.explanation_tex: Select the field used for sorting the data by default. It can be by date, name... For objects containing a lot of data, like transactions, we recommend using the date the event happened.
create_navigation_option.title: Create a navigation option
create_pivot.button.label: Create a decision group
create_pivot.description: A key in the data model used to filter or group decisions (<DocLink>learn more</DocLink>)
create_pivot.entity_selection.descriptio: Select which entity in your data model corresponds to the end user for a decision on {{table}}. This will allow you to investigate all alerts linked to the same customer in a case. See the documentation for more information.
create_pivot.errors.data.duplicate_pivot: A setting is already configured for this table. Contact Marble to change it.
create_pivot.select_entity.same_table: None of the above: choose a field from the {{table}} entity to group decisions, with limited support in the case manager interface.
create_pivot.select_field.callout: Please note that the recommended option is to select an entity that represents the end user corresponding to a decision on {{table}}.
create_pivot.select_field.description: Select the field that will be used to group decisions on entities of the type {{table}}, allowing you to snooze rules and group decisions into cases.
create_pivot.select_path.description: Look up the {{parent}} corresponding to a {{child}} entity by following the link
create_pivot.title: Group decisions on {{table}} by...
create_pivot.validate_path.description: Look up the {{parent}} corresponding to a {{child}} entity by following the link {{link}}.
create_pivot.validate_self_link.descript: Decisions will be grouped with decisions on other entities that have been configured to group at the {{table}} level
create_table.title: Create a new table
edit_field.is_unique.cannot_toggle_index: The unicity constraint on the field is currently being created. Please wait for the operation to complete before untoggling this setting.
edit_field.is_unique.cannot_untoggle_fie: A link from another table pointing to this field exists. This requires the values being unique, so you cannot untoggle this setting.
edit_field.is_unique.title: This field is unique
edit_field.is_unique.toggle: If toggled, duplicate values (two objects sharing the same value for this field) will not be allowed
edit_field.is_unique.warning_creation_as: Note: creating the constraint that makes a field enforce unique values is asynchronous, and may take a while before being fully active. It may also fail if there already are duplicate values.
edit_field.is_unique.warning_untoggle: Beware: untoggling this setting will remove the constraint that enforces unique values on this field. If you need to enforce it again, it may take a while and may fail if duplicate values have been inserted in the meantime.
edit_field.title: Edit field
edit_table.title: Edit description
links_from_table: Links from to other entities from <TableLocale>{{tableName}}</TableLocale>
menu.create_pivot.label: Group decisions by...
view_pivot.field.description: Decisions on entities of the type {{table}} are grouped by the field {{field}}, allowing to snooze rules and group decisions into cases.
view_pivot.link.description: Look up the {{parent}} corresponding to a {{child}} entity by following the link {{link}}.
view_pivot.self_link.description: Decisions are grouped with decisions on other entities that have been configured to group at the {{table}} level
view_pivot.title: Group details
viewer.no_object_found: No object found for id "{{objectId}}" in {{tableName}}
your_data_callout: This is the list of all the objects you can send to Marble, as well as their properties. Get in touch with the Marble team if you'd like to make changes to your data model.
